text: Arnaldo Bologni (born 23 August 1960) is an Italian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 1993 Mediterranean Games Category:Competitors at the 1997 Mediterranean Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Mediterranean Games silver medalists for Italy Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Italy Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in equestrian
title: Arnaldo Bologni
